Articles.Content: So after a little while playing this game I've fallen into the how silly of things can I do. Like orbiting with a single stage of solid rocket boosters or trying to max out the G-meter on lift off. Or this one that I came up with last night. Just make it to space only using RCS as thrust. No other engines may be used but RCS. My record is 45,000 ish meters. I'm going to go with it being impossible to orbit like this but I think escaping the atmosphere is possible.

This has been done before I'm afraid. I don't know if linear RCS thrusters are fixed in this version but they were certainly buggy in the previous version - a set of eight attached to one fuel tank would hit 300,000m altitude.

RCS to Jool.

Boring. How about RCS from the 'surface' of Jool back to kerbin?
